column12: Yard trimmings, Food waste Recycled and Composting (thousand tons)
column14: All others* Recycled and Composting (thousand tons)

column1: * All other includes rubber, leather, textiles and wood. Electrolytes in lead acid batteries are also included but may not be recycled.
Source: U.S. EPA. Advancing Sustainable Materials Management: 2018 Tables and Figures. December 2020. Supporting information.
